interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Super Special Days
Review Date: 2013/06/18
Store: Clem Cheung  (Actor),     Khamani Griffin  (Actor),     Allan Jacobsen  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Super Special Days!', 'is the DVD launch of', 'Ni Hao, Kai-lan', '.', 'Ni Hao Kai-lan', 'is an all-new animated series from Nickelodeon designed to open the eyes, ears and hearts of children to a fantastic new way to understand their social, emotional and physical world. Kai-lan and her animal friends encounter and learn to overcome daily obstacles that will help kids at home make sense of the world around them. Aspects of Chinese-American family, food and culture, as well as basic Mandarin Chinese phrases are woven throughout the episodes.', 'Amazon.com', 'A sort of', 'Dora the Explorer', 'that features Mandarin Chinese instead of Spanish,', 'Ni hao, Kai-lan', "is an entertaining Nick Jr. animated program for preschoolers that positively portrays biculturalism, helps build problem solving skills, and introduces basic Chinese words. Kai-lan is a creative, compassionate young girl who has a very close relationship with her Grandfather (YeYe) and loves to play and try new things with her many animal friends including Tolee the koala, Rintoo the tiger, and Hoho the monkey. Like all young children, Kai-lan and her friends play and explore and minor conflicts and emotional outbursts inevitably arise. Kai-lan has a way of stepping back and reviewing the situation to reveal the underlying problem, whether it's hurt feelings, frustration, or downright anger. With a little help from her grandfather and his calming techniques, she always finds a way to support her friends and make everyone feel better. Along the way, viewers learn some basic Chinese words and get a sense of the importance Chinese culture places on things like intergenerational families, calmness, and looking at things from another's perspective. (Ages 3 to 7)", '--Tami Horiuchi']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Feature', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Philip Malamuth, Khamani Griffin, Clem Cheung, Jade-Lianna Peters, Preston Strother, Zachary Gordon, Jack Samson, Laura Marano, Cheryl Katz, Karen Chau, Allan Jacobsen, Beverly Duan, Angie Wu, Ben Wang, Hsiang LoPhilip Malamuth, Khamani Griffin, Clem Cheung, Jade-Lianna Peters, Preston Strother, Zachary Gordon, Jack Samson, Laura Marano, Cheryl Katz, Karen Chau, Allan Jacobsen, Beverly Duan, Angie Wu, Ben Wang, Hsiang Lo   See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.57 x 5.36 x 7.59 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3978295', 'Director': 'Allan Jacobsen', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 8, 2012', 'Actors': 'Clem Cheung, Khamani Griffin, Angie Wu, Jack Samson, Jade-Lianna Peters', 'Dubbed': 'English', 'Studio': 'Nickelodeon', 'Writers': 'Karen Chau', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: good for kids to watch, shows them that life is always good when you have family and friends around you
Review Title: every day is special when you have friends
Rating: 5.0

nice collection

this is an older movie that my kids and grandkids love to watch..love the way that Stuart looks so real and the way he and the cats mouths move when they talk..my 3yr old gd. loves it..and so do I..
so cute to watch
Ni Hao Kai-Lan: Princess Kai-Lan
U, Karen Chau  (Director),     Chau, Karen  (Director),     Peters, Jade-Lianna  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Movies & TV Holiday Wishlist
['Kai-lan, Rintoo, Tolee and Hoho are playing in the backyard when they get a visit from their superhero friend, the Monkey King, who really needs their help. Will Kai-lan and her friends go on an adventure with the Monkey King and see what they can do? Of course they will! The Monkey King gives them robes to wear that give them special powers to float, jump, and spin in the air! They’ll have to use their special powers – and the viewer’s help – to leap over bamboo forests, travel past a moat of giant bubbles, and find their way into the majestic palaces.']
{'Genre': "Children's", 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna, U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'U, Karen Chau, Chau, Karen', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC', 'Actors': 'Peters, Jade-Lianna', 'Studio': 'NIC'}
my 4 yr old grandaughter loves these movies.I couldnt find any of them in the stores so I was very glad to be able to find them on the amazon. I like the fact that each one of these kinds of movies teaches  about different cultures and lifestyles in a way that is interesting for little kids.
great story line
Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Kai-Lan's Great Trip to China
Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Animation
["Join Kai-Lan and her friends Rintoo, Tolee and Ho Ho on their exciting trip to China! In the double-length, feature episode Kai-lan and her friends travel to visit her aunt and a baby panda in China, and are amazed by all the things they see along the way! The DVD includes 2 additional episodes, plus a Kai-Lan Goes to China game. Special Features: Full Frame Audio: Dolby Digital, Stereo - English Features: 1. Music Video: We're Going to China Music Video Runtime: 96 Minutes."]

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest**: Enthusiastic about action and adventure films while increasingly drawn to family-friendly content that educates children about diverse cultures and lifestyles through engaging storytelling. Recent purchases highlight a focus on animated series that introduce bilingual concepts and cultural values.
- **Shopping Behavior**: Prioritizes cost-effectiveness by favoring bulk purchases and multi-pack options to maximize savings on educational and entertaining content for children.
- **Content Format Preference**: Enjoys collecting physical media, particularly DVDs, emphasizing a desire for tangible family experiences and the ability to share valuable content with loved ones.
- **Quality Expectations**: Holds high standards for shipping speed and product satisfaction, consistently providing positive feedback for satisfying experiences, especially those that meet educational and entertainment needs.
- **Entertainment Value**: Values collections that offer varied, family-oriented narratives suitable for intergenerational viewership, with a strong focus on educational aspects for younger audiences.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to rate highly when products meet or exceed expectations, particularly appreciating delivery efficiency, content quality, and the educational merit of chosen films.
- **Interaction Retrospective**: Displays a commitment to sourcing family-oriented films that blend personal interests with educational value, reflecting a focus on the importance of family connections, cultural storytelling, and social-emotional learning for children.

Overall, the user exemplifies a blend of entertainment and educational values in their selection of films, favoring both action and culturally rich narratives for family engagement.
